name: Emberwind - HTML5 version
description:
No ads, no in-app purchases !

The people of Grendale are under siege by mischievous hordes of gremlins and only a stubby gnome watchman named Kindle Elderwood can answer the call for a hero.

Features:
-beautiful visuals
-fast paced , goblin smashing mayhem
-lots of treasure
-secret areas to explore
-combos and special moves
-3 maps full of smashing , jumping, running fun
-replay the maps and explore all the nooks and crannies!
-no ads and no in app purchases

For those who enjoy quality over quantity, on the short side...but very enjoyable! and replayable !
